entry.title: AlphaQubit tackles one of quantum computing’s biggest challenges
entry.summary: AlphaQubit is an AI-based decoder that identifies quantum computing errors with state-of-the-art accuracy.

entry.title: Blog
entry.summary: Discover our latest AI breakthroughs, projects, and updates.

entry.title: AlphaGenome: AI for better understanding the genome
entry.summary: Introducing a new, unifying DNA sequence model that advances regulatory variant-effect prediction and promises to shed new light on genome function — now available via API.

entry.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases
entry.summary: New AI tool classifies the effects of 71 million ‘missense’ mutations Uncovering the root causes of disease is one of the greatest challenges in human genetics. With millions of possible...

entry.title: AlphaProteo generates novel proteins for biology and health research
entry.summary: New AI system designs proteins that successfully bind to target molecules, with potential for advancing drug design, disease understanding and more.

entry.title: AlphaEvolve: A Gemini-powered coding agent for designing advanced algorithms
entry.summary: New AI agent evolves algorithms for math and practical applications in computing by combining the creativity of large language models with automated evaluators

entry.title: AI achieves silver-medal standard solving International Mathematical Olympiad problems
entry.summary: Breakthrough models AlphaProof and AlphaGeometry 2 solve advanced reasoning problems in mathematics

entry.title: Millions of new materials discovered with deep learning
entry.summary: We share the discovery of 2.2 million new crystals – equivalent to nearly 800 years’ worth of knowledge. We introduce Graph Networks for Materials Exploration (GNoME), our new deep learning tool...

entry.title: Accelerating fusion science through learned plasma control
entry.summary: Successfully controlling the nuclear fusion plasma in a tokamak with deep reinforcement learning

entry.title: Genie 3: A New Frontier for World Models
entry.summary: Today we are announcing Genie 3, a general purpose world model that can generate an unprecedented diversity of interactive environments. Given a text prompt, Genie 3 can generate dynamic worlds...
